entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning early this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating early this evening. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
